Issue.creator: sstone1
Issue.summary: Update blacklisted versions from BYFN for Fabric v2.0
Issue.description: There are checks in BYFN for ensuring that you don't run on v1.0.0, v1.1.0-preview, or v1.1.0-alpha. These checks are clearly well out of date, but they should be updated so that users do not accidentally use Fabric v1.x with BYFN from Fabric v2.0, or vice-versa.
